Reapertura de mi blog/ Reopening my blog
entry.content:
Hola! ¬øQu√© tal est√°is?
Hace mucho tiempo que no publico por aqu√≠, y es que la raz√≥n es porque tuve unos problemillas t√©cnicos y se me borr√≥ una entrada completa. Mi querido t√©cnico de mantenimiento del blog ya lo ha solucionado y ¬°aqu√≠ estoy de vuelta!. 
Ya que la entrada que se me borr√≥ era de fotos, y este fin de semana he estado fuera en el pueblecito de mi madre (Vera, Almer√≠a), he tomado bastantes fotos que compartir√© aqu√≠ con todos vosotros. Algunas son del paseo que dimos un d√≠a por la tarde, y otra sesi√≥n es exclusivamente de las flores que tiene mi madre en su piso. Como son muchas, he decidido hacer dos entradas diferentes, as√≠ que estad atentos los pr√≥ximos d√≠as.
Gracias por leer mi blog. Tened un buen d√≠a!. 
Rena.
Hi there! How are you?
It's been a while since I last published something here, and the reason is because I had some little technical problems and one of the posts got erased. My dear blog maintenance technician has fixed it already, so I am back!. 
As the lost post was about photography, and this weekend I was out in the village of my mother (Vera, Almer√≠a), I took a lot of photos that I will share here with you all. Some of them are of a walk we took a day in the afternoon, and the other sesion of photographies is exclusively of the flowes that my mother has in her apartment. There are a high amount of photos, and that is why I have decided to do two different posts, so stay tuned for the following days.
Thanks for reading my blog. Have a good day!.
Rena.

link.title: Reapertura de mi blog/ Reopening my blog

entry.title: M√∫sica/Music: lo que escucho ahora/ what I listen to now
entry.content:
Hola! ¬øQu√© tal est√°is? Hoy os vengo a hablar de m√∫sica. Pocos sabr√°n lo mucho que me gusta cantar, y algunos consideran que canto bien. Siempre estoy canturreando y de hecho, ahora estoy cantando mientras escribo esta entrada.
√öltimamente estoy enganchad√≠sima a una canci√≥n de Whitney Houston (seguro que mis vecinos y mi pareja est√°n hartos de escucharla). La canci√≥n en cuesti√≥n es "Run to You" y la escuch√© en un concurso de talento ucraniano e inmediatamente me encant√≥. Quiz√°s alg√∫n d√≠a me anime a hacer una cover! (Si quer√©is que lo haga y lo publique, dejadme un comentario). Otra canci√≥n que me encanta cantar es "No Air" de Jordin Sparks y Chris Brown. S√© que son antiguas, pero las buenas canciones nunca dejan de ser buenas.
La verdad es que soy bastante t√≠mida para estas cosas y no tengo mucha confianza en mi "talento", as√≠ que por eso quiz√°s ser√≠a buena idea compartirlo con vosotros y ver qu√© opin√°is, aunque me muera de la verg√ºenza. ¬øQuiz√°s quer√°is que cant√© otra canci√≥n diferente? Siempre estoy viendo concursos de talento e imagin√°ndome c√≥mo ser√≠a actuar delante de tanta gente (sin contar la que te vea por la televisi√≥n tambi√©n).
De peque√±a me acuerdo que sol√≠a cantar para mi madre, con mi hermano tocando la guitarra. ¬°Qu√© buenos tiempos aquellos! Siempre he dicho que mi trabajo so√±ado, aparte de ser traductora, es ser cantante. Pero bueno, los sue√±os, sue√±os son.
Como ya he mencionado, si quer√©is que haga alguna cover de alguna canci√≥n en particular, me lo pod√©is comentar y os tendr√© en cuenta para ello. Adem√°s, quiero saber qu√© es lo pr√≥ximo que quer√©is ver en el blog para saber qu√© os gusta. Estoy abierta a sugerencias!. Gracias por leer mi blog. Tened un buen d√≠a!. 

Rena.

Hi there. How are you? Today I'm here to talk about music. Few people know how much I love singing, and few of them think that I'm a good singer. I'm always singing here and there, and, in fact, I'm singing while I write this post.
Lately I've been addicted to a song by Whitney Houston (for sure my neighbours and my partner are sick of hearing it all the day). The song in particular is "Run To You" and I first heard it in an Ukrainian talent show, and I immediately loved it. Maybe some day I will be brave enough to do a cover! (if you want to see that, leave a comment!). Another song that I love to sing is "No Air" by Jordin Sparks and Chris Brown. I know they are old, but good songs are always good.
Actually, I'm pretty shy to do a think like that and I have no self-confidence in my "talent", so perhaps it's a good idea to share it with you and see what you think, although most likely I would die of embarrassment. Maybe you want me to sing a different song? I'm always watching talent shows and imagining how it would be to perfom in front of that many people (apart from those watching the TV).
When I was little, I remember that I usually sang for my mum, when my brother playing the guitar as well. Good, old times! I've always said that my dreamt job (apart from being a translator) is being a singer. But, dreams are dreams.
As I have mentioned, if you want me to do a cover of a particular song, you can leave a comment and I will take that into consideration. Moreover, I want to know what is the next thing you want to see in this blog, in order to know what you like. I am open to suggests!. Thanks for reading my blog. Have a good day!

Rena.

link.title: M√∫sica/Music: lo que escucho ahora/ what I listen to now

entry.title: Introduction/Introducci√≥n
entry.content:
Antes de nada, me gustar√≠a presentarme. Me llamo Rena y tengo 22. Vivo en Madrid, Espa√±a, y estoy graduada en Estudios Ingleses, por eso voy a escribir en mi blog en ingl√©s y espa√±ol. Empec√© un blog hace algunos a√±os, pero lo abandon√© por completo por falta de tiempo (estudios, ya sabes). Ahora que me he graduado, pens√© en desarrollar mis aficiones de nuevo (aparte de escribir, me gusta dibujar). Hace unas semanas, un amigo m√≠o me anim√≥ a hace un blog de nuevo, as√≠ que aqu√≠ estoy. Este blog va a ir principalmente sobre mis hobbies: fotograf√≠e, m√∫sica, maquillaje, libros, pel√≠culas, series, cosas random que encuentre en internet, etc. Espero que te resulte este blog entretenido y no dudes en seguirme para ver el pr√≥ximo contenido. Y si hay algo que te gustar√≠a ver en este blog o quieres que mejore algo, puedes dejar un comentario sin problema. Gracias por leer esto. Ten un buen d√≠a!

Rena.


First of all, I would like to introduce myself. My name is Rena and I‚Äôm 22. I live in Madrid, Spain and I‚Äôm graduated in English Studies, so that‚Äôs why I am writing my blog in both Spanish and English. I started a blog a few years ago, but I totally abandoned it because of lack of time (studies, you know). Now that I am graduated, I felt like developing my hobbies again (apart from writing, I love drawing). Some weeks ago, one of my friends encouraged me to start a blog again and here I am.  This blog will be mainly about my hobbies: photography, music, makeup, books, films, series, random stuff I find on the Internet, etc. I hope you‚Äôll find this blog entertaining and feel free to follow the upcoming content. And if there is something that you would like to see in this blog or you want me to improve something, feel free to leave a comment. Thank you for reading this. Have a good day!

Rena.
